sentences.en: ...instruct our children not to tattle on one another.
sentences.cn: ...教导我们的孩子不要互相打对方的小报告。

sentences.en: " Well, go and tattle and see if I care, " replied Scarlett.
sentences.cn: " 好吧, 看我究竟喜欢不喜欢, 你走着瞧. " 思嘉回答道.

sentences.en: BR > 4． The two gossips , when coming together, would tittle - tattle to the slander of others.
sentences.cn: 那两个长舌妇, 碰到一起时总要喋喋不休地诽谤别人.

sentences.en: But does tittle-tattle really help attract more friends?
sentences.cn: 但闲聊真的能吸引来更多的朋友吗？

sentences.en: Did you hear his frenzied tattle?
sentences.cn: 你听见这疯狂的闲谈了吗？

sentences.en: Graham : Well It'sounds like office tittle tattle to me . I just don't believe it.
sentences.cn: 格雷姆: 这看来是办公室的流言蜚语,我一点都不相信.

sentences.en: It's marketed under the trade name "Tattle".
sentences.cn: 它以Tattle这一品牌名称在市场上出售。

sentences.en: Well - directed tittle - tattle may easily causes its victim to lose his or her livelihood.
sentences.cn: 针对性很强的聊天,很容易使受害者丢掉饭碗.

sentences.en: Well? Or are you going to tattle and get me in trouble again?
sentences.cn: 涌出? 或是你去再一次在麻烦中闲谈而且得到我?

sentences.en: When all the soldiers are girded for tattle, we will march against the enemy.
sentences.cn: 当全体士兵做好准备时, 我们就向敌人进军.

sentences.en: When they come tattle I ask them if it's a medical emergency.
sentences.cn: 当他们来找我告状时,我会问他们是否是[医疗紧急]状况?

words.tran_cn: 说闲话的人；搬弄是非的人

trans.tran_en: to talk about other people’s private lives

trans.tran_cn: 由闲谈而泄露（秘密），在闲谈中说出
